positive_comments: I read through every module in 1.0 and 2.0 - an amazing upgrade - I found both courses immensely approved and can't compliment your team enough.  A synopsis below: 1.0 Love the following adds/call-outs: Leading without a title, happy (engaged) workforce, balancing short-term stability with long-term innovation, risk management, etc.  2.0 Loved: Coaching/Mentoring, add on of journaling - this is coming up more and more in CEO/C-Suite needs for personal and professional well-being AND performance assessment. Loved: title "Communities of Practice" - excellent descriptor and TRUE. Loved the call-outs on: Asana, Survey Monkey, Qualtrics... we use all of them.   Loved: Reputation Management and Crisis Management... wondering if "crisis" is now a steady state.... Loved: Storytelling use of...
improvement_opportunities: 1.0 Only one item: in the overconfidence section.. good examples of confidence, etc were all men and the first slide on "overconfidence" - a big full length picture - was a woman. I would suggest that sequence be tempered - it was quite a stark contrast. Other than that, wouldn't change a thing... so very well-done!! Bravo! 2.0 All the videos and links were missing BUT the content flow and topics were right on target and well-executed. I would add "Calendly" to the tools of asana, survey monkey, etc.
